thing-type.label: HS-FS100+ Flex Flex Sensor
thing-type.description: Flex Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtHS-FS100+ (“Flex Sensor”) is a multi functional module that includes a temperature sensor, controllable buzzer, and a port to connect external light or water sensors.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtAttach the included light or water sensor cable. Put your home automation controller into Z-Wave ‘inclusion’ mode.</li&gt <li&gtPress the Z-Wave network button on the front of the unit one time. Wait for the inclusion process to finish. This may take some time.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPut your home automation controller into Z-Wave ‘exclusion’ mode.</li&gt <li&gtPress the Z-Wave network button on the front of the unit one time. Wait for the exclusion process to finish. This may take some time.</li&gt </ol&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Water Detecton beep frequency
parameter.description: Water Detecton beep frequency<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0=every 10 minutes (approx batery life of 3 months in this mode)<br /&gt1=every 5 minutes<br /&gt2=every 30 minutes</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Temperature reportng interval when on line power
parameter.description: Temperature reportng interval when on line power<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt30-255 seconds, default=60</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Flashing LED detection delay
parameter.description: Flashing LED detection delay<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSet delay to avoid continuous notifications when detecting flashing LED’s. Flex Sensor will not send notification until flashing LED status changes.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Lifeline
parameter.description: <br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtFlex Sensor supports Group 1 association. Group 1 reports the sensor’s status and battery if running on batteries.</p&gt
